name: Clouds 'n Crows (PROTOTYPE)
description:
A lesson in what not to do in Ludum Dare. After 5 successful compos, it had to happen. An unfinished game! But in a way, I'm glad this got in the state that it is because you truly learn more from your failures than wins.

I'll certainly be doing a little writeup about this game in the coming days, so stay tuned :D. In the mean time, enjoy this unfinished mess.
